EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, 100 PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
IN 33-55.00N 012-30.00E AT 301028Z DEC.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE,
REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA,
PHONE: 2189 1052 0474, 2189 1034 9739,
2189 2225 2427, 2182 1444 9488,
2182 1444 9149,2182 1717 3377,
E-MAIL: LCG.OPS.RM@MOD.GOV.LY,
LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY, LMRCC.2@MOD.GOV.LY,
PSO.BEN@LMA.LY
OR REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
